price: Katakanlah, "Terangkanlah kepadaku jika Allah mencabut pendengaran dan penglihatan serta menutup hatimu, siapakah tuhan selain Allah yang kuasa mengembalikannya kepadamu?" Perhatikanlah, bagaimana Kami berkali-kali memperlihatkan tanda-tanda kebesaran (Kami), kemudian mereka tetap berpaling (juga).
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ سَمۡعَكُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرَكُمۡ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُم مَّنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِۗ ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ ثُمَّ هُمۡ يَصۡدِفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in akhadha al-lahu samʿakum wa-abṣārakum wakhatama ʿalā qulūbikum man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum bihi unẓur kayfa nuṣarrifu al-āyāti thumma hum yaṣdifūna
